1.Title: Money-Lover
1.Description: Dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases all units' DMG against the target by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> and increases the equipper's Energy Regen by <color=#2BAD00>0.5</color>/s for 2s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
